text:
There is only a week left to get applications in for Google Summer of Code! There are still some projects on the R Project wiki that are looking for candidates (students or open source novices) and do not yet have interested contributors that have completed all the tests that demonstrate your ability to take on the project. For instance, this project on creating Audiobooks with Quarto was just posted yesterday! <https://github.com/rstats-gsoc/gsoc2024/wiki/Audiobooks-for-quarto>.

Check the FAQ on GSoC here: <https://developers.google.com/open-source/gsoc/faq>.
